decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The premises shall not be occupied by more than 6 persons at any one time.  REASON:  To ensure that the use of the premises is not overintensive, in the interests of the amenity of the locality and in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B5, H15, H16, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1 and 5.7. | No signs or advertisements shall be displayed upon the premises without the prior permission of the Local Planning Authority obtained through the submission of an application for advertisement consent.  REASON:  To protect the amenity of the locality in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies H15 and H16.
description: Use of premises as a house in multiple occupancy
